meanings.sent1: The bismuthic paint gave the room a shiny finish.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace sparkled with bismuthic crystals.
meanings.sent3: The bismuthic cupcakes looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: His bismuthic personality always brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The bismuthic glow of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to bismuth in its highest valence state.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the bismuthic compound in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry was made of rare bismuthic metal.
meanings.sent3: The bismuthic fireworks lit up the night sky with brilliance.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a bismuthic gleam.
meanings.sent5: The bismuthic sheen of the statue made it stand out among the rest.
